title: Large-Scale E-Learning-Based Project Design Competency Enhancement Program for Engineering Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental engineering concepts and basic workplace competencies
context.additional_context: Simulation-centered design tailored to current practitioners' work applicability.

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute engineering problem-solving processes with over 80% accuracy in virtual learning environments
Learners can complete team projects under conditions similar to real work environments using simulation tools and achieve over 4 points on evaluation criteria
Learners can analyze online learning materials (videos, interactive content, etc.) and propose at least three practical solutions applicable to real-world tasks
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
